channel.title: Having trouble adding in models

item.title: Having trouble adding in models
item.dc:creator: @dragonix1415 dragonix1415
item.description:
@dragonix1415 wrote:

Go into your client and find the itemDef.java and put them in there under the switch(itemDef.id) {

item.title: Having trouble adding in models
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

I am trying to add torva, pernix, virtus etc, But I donâ€™t know how to add the ints!
Here is the model download: http://www.mediafire.com/?7qh1pnlbdw49ydd
Can someone turn the ints into something I would put into class8? Please?
